version.name: version
version.description: Version number of the BlackBerryServer MIB.

besTotMsgsPending.name: besTotMsgsPending
besTotMsgsPending.description: Total number of messages queued for delivery to handhelds.

besTotMsgsSent.name: besTotMsgsSent
besTotMsgsSent.description: Total number of messages sent from handhelds.

besTotMsgsRecvd.name: besTotMsgsRecvd
besTotMsgsRecvd.description: Total number of messages delivered to handhelds.

besTotMsgsXpired.name: besTotMsgsXpired
besTotMsgsXpired.description: Total number of messages that have expired.

besTotMsgsFiltered.name: besTotMsgsFiltered
besTotMsgsFiltered.description: Total number of messages that have been filtered.

besTotMsgsSentPerMin.name: besTotMsgsSentPerMin
besTotMsgsSentPerMin.description: Total number of messages sent from handhelds per min.

besTotMsgsRecvdPerMin.name: besTotMsgsRecvdPerMin
besTotMsgsRecvdPerMin.description: Total number of messages delivered to handhelds per min.

besNumServerInfoAvailable.name: besNumServerInfoAvailable
besNumServerInfoAvailable.description: The number of BlackBerry Servers installed on this system, information for which is exposed and currently available via SNMP.

besConfigTable.name: besConfigTable
besConfigTable.description: This table represents Configuration container for BlackBerry Servers running on the system.

besConfigLicenceTotal.name: besConfigLicenceTotal
besConfigLicenceTotal.description: Total number of licences installed on the server.

besConfigLicenceUsed.name: besConfigLicenceUsed
besConfigLicenceUsed.description: Total number of licences in use currently.

besConfigLicenceRemaining.name: besConfigLicenceRemaining
besConfigLicenceRemaining.description: Total number of licences remaining for use.

besConfigServerUID.name: besConfigServerUID
besConfigServerUID.description: UID of this BlackBerry Server instance.

besConfigAutoBCCEnabled.name: besConfigAutoBCCEnabled
besConfigAutoBCCEnabled.description: Is the AutoBCC function enabled? 1 - yes, 0 - no.

besConfigAutoBCCAddress.name: besConfigAutoBCCAddress
besConfigAutoBCCAddress.description: If AutoBCC function enabled, address it is configured to send to. Empty if not enabled.

besConfigForceSaveInSentEnabled.name: besConfigForceSaveInSentEnabled
besConfigForceSaveInSentEnabled.description: Is the Force Save in Sent function enabled? Applies to BlackBerry Enterprise Server for Lotus Domino only.

besConfigWirelessEmailRecoEnabled.name: besConfigWirelessEmailRecoEnabled
besConfigWirelessEmailRecoEnabled.description: Is the Wireless Email Reco enabled?

besSysHealthTable.name: besSysHealthTable
besSysHealthTable.description: This table represents System Health container for BlackBerry Servers running on the system.

besSysHealthSrpConnectedState.name: besSysHealthSrpConnectedState
besSysHealthSrpConnectedState.description: Is the BlackBerry Server connected to the SRP Host?

besSysHealthSrpLastConnectDate.name: besSysHealthSrpLastConnectDate
besSysHealthSrpLastConnectDate.description: Datetime of last successful connection to the SRP Host.

besSysHealthSrpReconnectSuccess.name: besSysHealthSrpReconnectSuccess
besSysHealthSrpReconnectSuccess.description: Number of times the BlackBerry Server has successfully reconnected to SRP Host since it was started.

besSysHealthSrpReconnectsFail.name: besSysHealthSrpReconnectsFail
besSysHealthSrpReconnectsFail.description: Number of times the BlackBerry Server has tried, but failed, to connect to SRP Host since it was started.

besSysHealthSrpTotalSecNotConnected.name: besSysHealthSrpTotalSecNotConnected
besSysHealthSrpTotalSecNotConnected.description: Total number of seconds the BlackBerry Server has NOT been connected to SRP Host since startup.

besSysHealthSrpLastErrorText.name: besSysHealthSrpLastErrorText
besSysHealthSrpLastErrorText.description: Error text about the last failed connection attempt.

besSysHealthSrpLastErrorTime.name: besSysHealthSrpLastErrorTime
besSysHealthSrpLastErrorTime.description: Datetime of the last connection error.

besSysHealthMsgTotalProc.name: besSysHealthMsgTotalProc
besSysHealthMsgTotalProc.description: Total number of messages processed by the BlackBerry server since startup. Includes to handheld, from handheld and filtered messages.

besSysHealthMsgToHandheld.name: besSysHealthMsgToHandheld
besSysHealthMsgToHandheld.description: Total number of messages that passed the filter criteria and were sent out to handhelds.

besSysHealthMsgFromHandheld.name: besSysHealthMsgFromHandheld
besSysHealthMsgFromHandheld.description: Total number of messages sent from handhelds.

besSysHealthMsgFilteredByUser.name: besSysHealthMsgFilteredByUser
besSysHealthMsgFilteredByUser.description: Total number of messages filtered out by user filter settings.

besSysHealthMsgFilteredByGlobal.name: besSysHealthMsgFilteredByGlobal
besSysHealthMsgFilteredByGlobal.description: Total number of messages filtered out by the global filter settings.

besSysHealthMsgPending.name: besSysHealthMsgPending
besSysHealthMsgPending.description: Total number of messages pending delivery.

besSysHealthMsgErrors.name: besSysHealthMsgErrors
besSysHealthMsgErrors.description: Total number of messages that were non-deliverable due to error.

besSysHealthMsgMoreRequests.name: besSysHealthMsgMoreRequests
besSysHealthMsgMoreRequests.description: Total number of MORE requests issued from devices.

besSysHealthCalUsersOTACEnabled.name: besSysHealthCalUsersOTACEnabled
besSysHealthCalUsersOTACEnabled.description: Total number of users enabled for OTA Calendar.

besSysHealthCalEventToHandheld.name: besSysHealthCalEventToHandheld
besSysHealthCalEventToHandheld.description: Total number of calendar events sent to handhelds.

besSysHealthCalEventFromHandheld.name: besSysHealthCalEventFromHandheld
besSysHealthCalEventFromHandheld.description: Total number of calendar events sent by handhelds.

besSysHealthWERUsersEnabled.name: besSysHealthWERUsersEnabled
besSysHealthWERUsersEnabled.description: Total number of users enabled for Wireless Email Reco.

besSysHealthWERRequestsToHandheld.name: besSysHealthWERRequestsToHandheld
besSysHealthWERRequestsToHandheld.description: Total number of Wireless Email Reco events sent to handhelds.

besSysHealthWERRequestsFromHandheld.name: besSysHealthWERRequestsFromHandheld
besSysHealthWERRequestsFromHandheld.description: Total number of Wireless Email Reco events sent from handhelds.

besSysHealthMdsTotalBytesFromDevices.name: besSysHealthMdsTotalBytesFromDevices
besSysHealthMdsTotalBytesFromDevices.description: Total data size (in bytes) from device.

besSysHealthMdsMaxPacketSizeFromDevice.name: besSysHealthMdsMaxPacketSizeFromDevice
besSysHealthMdsMaxPacketSizeFromDevice.description: Maximum packet data size (in bytes) from device.

besSysHealthMdsAvgPacketSizeFromDevice.name: besSysHealthMdsAvgPacketSizeFromDevice
besSysHealthMdsAvgPacketSizeFromDevice.description: Average packet data size (in bytes) from device.

besSysHealthMdsTotalBytesToDevice.name: besSysHealthMdsTotalBytesToDevice
besSysHealthMdsTotalBytesToDevice.description: Total data size (in bytes) from push.

besSysHealthMdsMaxPacketSizeToDevice.name: besSysHealthMdsMaxPacketSizeToDevice
besSysHealthMdsMaxPacketSizeToDevice.description: Maximum packet data size (in bytes) from push.

besSysHealthMdsAvgPacketSizeToDevice.name: besSysHealthMdsAvgPacketSizeToDevice
besSysHealthMdsAvgPacketSizeToDevice.description: Average packet data size (in bytes) from push.

besSysHealthMdsRefusedPackets.name: besSysHealthMdsRefusedPackets
besSysHealthMdsRefusedPackets.description: Number of packets refused by SRP Host.

besSysHealthMdsInvalidPackets.name: besSysHealthMdsInvalidPackets
besSysHealthMdsInvalidPackets.description: Number of invalid packets received by MDS.

besSysHealthMdsConnectionSuccess.name: besSysHealthMdsConnectionSuccess
besSysHealthMdsConnectionSuccess.description: Number of successful connections initiated by MDS to another address/service.

besSysHealthMdsConnectionFailure.name: besSysHealthMdsConnectionFailure
besSysHealthMdsConnectionFailure.description: Number of failed connections initiated by MDS to another address/service.

besSysHealthMdsConnectionTruncated.name: besSysHealthMdsConnectionTruncated
besSysHealthMdsConnectionTruncated.description: Number of truncated connections encountered by MDS.

besSysHealthV1MsgsPending.name: besSysHealthV1MsgsPending
besSysHealthV1MsgsPending.description: Total number of messages queued for delivery to handhelds.

besSysHealthV1TotalMsgsSent.name: besSysHealthV1TotalMsgsSent
besSysHealthV1TotalMsgsSent.description: Total number of messages sent from handhelds.

besSysHealthV1TotalMsgsReceived.name: besSysHealthV1TotalMsgsReceived
besSysHealthV1TotalMsgsReceived.description: Total number of messages delivered to handhelds.

besSysHealthV1TotalMsgsExpired.name: besSysHealthV1TotalMsgsExpired
besSysHealthV1TotalMsgsExpired.description: Total number of messages that have expired.

besSysHealthV1TotalMsgsFiltered.name: besSysHealthV1TotalMsgsFiltered
besSysHealthV1TotalMsgsFiltered.description: Total number of messages that have been filtered.

besSysHealthV1MsgsSentPerMin.name: besSysHealthV1MsgsSentPerMin
besSysHealthV1MsgsSentPerMin.description: Total number of messages sent from handhelds per min.

besSysHealthV1MsgsRecvdPerMin.name: besSysHealthV1MsgsRecvdPerMin
besSysHealthV1MsgsRecvdPerMin.description: Total number of messages delivered to handhelds per min.

besSysHealthV1SRPConnectState.name: besSysHealthV1SRPConnectState
besSysHealthV1SRPConnectState.description: Indication of the state of the SRP connection.

besMailServerHealthTable.name: besMailServerHealthTable
besMailServerHealthTable.description: This table contains the list of mail servers as well as statistics and performance values related to each particular mail server. Applies to BlackBerry Enterprise Server for Lotus Domino only.

besMailServerHealthEntry.name: besMailServerHealthEntry
besMailServerHealthEntry.description: Mail Server entries. The BlackBerry Server instance and Server Health user ID are used as the index value associated with each row. Applies to BlackBerry Enterprise Server for Lotus Domino only.

besMailServerHealthServerInstance.name: besMailServerHealthServerInstance
besMailServerHealthServerInstance.description: Instance id of the BlackBerry Server associated with this row. Applies to BlackBerry Enterprise Server for Lotus Domino only.

besMailServerHealthServerId.name: besMailServerHealthServerId
besMailServerHealthServerId.description: Instance id of the Mail Server associated with this row. Applies to BlackBerry Enterprise Server for Lotus Domino only.

besMailServerHealthServerName.name: besMailServerHealthServerName
besMailServerHealthServerName.description: Name of the Mail Server associated with this row. Applies to BlackBerry Enterprise Server for Lotus Domino only.

besMailServerHealthTotalUsers.name: besMailServerHealthTotalUsers
besMailServerHealthTotalUsers.description: Number of users who are homed on this mail server. Applies to BlackBerry Enterprise Server for Lotus Domino only.

besMailServerHealthAvgResponceTime10min.name: besMailServerHealthAvgResponceTime10min
besMailServerHealthAvgResponceTime10min.description: Average responce time (in milliseconds) for operations for users on this mail server in the last 10 minutes. Applies to BlackBerry Enterprise Server for Lotus Domino only.

besMailServerHealthFailedConn10min.name: besMailServerHealthFailedConn10min
besMailServerHealthFailedConn10min.description: Number of failed connection attempts to this mail server in the last 10 minutes. Applies to BlackBerry Enterprise Server for Lotus Domino only.

besUserHealthTable.name: besUserHealthTable
besUserHealthTable.description: This table contains the list of user configuration, statistics and performance values related to each particular user and device which are exist for a given BES.

besUserHealthEntry.name: besUserHealthEntry
besUserHealthEntry.description: mssqlDbOptionTable entries. The BlackBerry Server instance and User Health user ID are used as the index value associated with each row.

besUserHealthServerInstance.name: besUserHealthServerInstance
besUserHealthServerInstance.description: Instance id of the BlackBerry Server associated with this row.

besUserHealthUserId.name: besUserHealthUserId
besUserHealthUserId.description: Instance id of the user associated with this row.

besUserHealthUserName.name: besUserHealthUserName
besUserHealthUserName.description: User name of the user associated with this row.

besUserHealthLastErrorText.name: besUserHealthLastErrorText
besUserHealthLastErrorText.description: The last time an operation for this user failed, this is the error text we got back.

besUserHealthLastErrorTime.name: besUserHealthLastErrorTime
besUserHealthLastErrorTime.description: The datetime of the last error for the user associated with this row.

besUserHealthDeviceNetwork.name: besUserHealthDeviceNetwork
besUserHealthDeviceNetwork.description: Network the device is on for the user associated with this row.

besUserHealthDevicePIN.name: besUserHealthDevicePIN
besUserHealthDevicePIN.description: PIN number of the device for the user associated with this row.

besUserHealthNumRedirectedFolders.name: besUserHealthNumRedirectedFolders
besUserHealthNumRedirectedFolders.description: Number of redirected folders the user has configed.

besUserHealthSaveInSent.name: besUserHealthSaveInSent
besUserHealthSaveInSent.description: Is 'save in sent' enabled for the user associated with this row?

besUserHealthRedirectEnabledOnDesktop.name: besUserHealthRedirectEnabledOnDesktop
besUserHealthRedirectEnabledOnDesktop.description: Is redirection enabled in Desktop Manager for the user associated with this row?

besUserHealthDisableWhileInCradle.name: besUserHealthDisableWhileInCradle
besUserHealthDisableWhileInCradle.description: Is the option in Desktop Manager to disable redirection while in the cradle?

besUserHealthFullyConfigured.name: besUserHealthFullyConfigured
besUserHealthFullyConfigured.description: Is the Is the device fully configured with PIN & encryption key?

besUserHealthMsgTotalProc.name: besUserHealthMsgTotalProc
besUserHealthMsgTotalProc.description: Total number of Messages processed by the BES since startup for this user. Includes to handheld, from handheld and filtered.

besUserHealthMsgToHandheld.name: besUserHealthMsgToHandheld
besUserHealthMsgToHandheld.description: Total number of messages that passed the filter criteria and were sent out to the handheld. Messaging only (no calendar).

besUserHealthMsgFromHandheld.name: besUserHealthMsgFromHandheld
besUserHealthMsgFromHandheld.description: Total number of messages sent from handheld. Messaging only (no calendar).

besUserHealthMsgFiltered.name: besUserHealthMsgFiltered
besUserHealthMsgFiltered.description: Total number of messages filtered out by user filter settings.

besUserHealthMsgPending.name: besUserHealthMsgPending
besUserHealthMsgPending.description: Total number of messages pending delivery.

besUserHealthMsgErrors.name: besUserHealthMsgErrors
besUserHealthMsgErrors.description: Total number of messages that were non-deliverable due to error.

besUserHealthMsgMoreRequests.name: besUserHealthMsgMoreRequests
besUserHealthMsgMoreRequests.description: Total number of MORE requests issued from device.

besUserHealthMsgForwardedFromDevice.name: besUserHealthMsgForwardedFromDevice
besUserHealthMsgForwardedFromDevice.description: Total number of messages the user has forwarded from the device.

besUserHealthMsgRepliedToWithText.name: besUserHealthMsgRepliedToWithText
besUserHealthMsgRepliedToWithText.description: Total number of messages that were replies-with-text from the device.

besUserHealthLastTimeInCradle.name: besUserHealthLastTimeInCradle
besUserHealthLastTimeInCradle.description: Datetime of the last time the user had the device in the cradle.

besUserHealthLastInteractionWithDevice.name: besUserHealthLastInteractionWithDevice
besUserHealthLastInteractionWithDevice.description: Datetime of the last interaction the BES had with the device.

besUserHealthLastMessageForwarded.name: besUserHealthLastMessageForwarded
besUserHealthLastMessageForwarded.description: Datetime of the last message (mail or calendar) that was sent to the device.

besUserHealthLastKeyDateGenerated.name: besUserHealthLastKeyDateGenerated
besUserHealthLastKeyDateGenerated.description: Datetime of the last time the user generated an encryption key.

besUserHealthAvgKBForwarded.name: besUserHealthAvgKBForwarded
besUserHealthAvgKBForwarded.description: Average size of messages forwarded from the device (in kb). I.e. if I receive a message with a 5mb attachment and forward it from my handheld to another user, this value would be 5120kb.

besUserHealthAvgKBReplyWithText.name: besUserHealthAvgKBReplyWithText
besUserHealthAvgKBReplyWithText.description: Similar to besUserHealthAvgKBForwarded, but for messages that are replies-with-text.

besUserHealthAvgLatencyInSecLast10Msg.name: besUserHealthAvgLatencyInSecLast10Msg
besUserHealthAvgLatencyInSecLast10Msg.description: For the last 10 messages sent to the handheld, the average length of time (in sec) between the message arriving in the mail system and a DELIVERED on the device.

besUserHealthCalEventToHandheld.name: besUserHealthCalEventToHandheld
besUserHealthCalEventToHandheld.description: Total number of calendar events sent to the device.

besUserHealthCalEventFromHandheld.name: besUserHealthCalEventFromHandheld
besUserHealthCalEventFromHandheld.description: Total number of calendar events sent from the device.

besUserHealthWirelessEmailRecoEnabled.name: besUserHealthWirelessEmailRecoEnabled
besUserHealthWirelessEmailRecoEnabled.description: Is the user enabled for Wireless Email Reco?

besUserHealthWERRequestsToHandheld.name: besUserHealthWERRequestsToHandheld
besUserHealthWERRequestsToHandheld.description: Total number of Wireless Email Reco events sent to handhelds

besUserHealthWERRequestsFromHandheld.name: besUserHealthWERRequestsFromHandheld
besUserHealthWERRequestsFromHandheld.description: Total number of Wireless Email Reco events sent from handhelds

besSRPConnectState.name: besSRPConnectState
besSRPConnectState.description: Indication of the state of the SRP connection.

besHungThreadEvent.name: besHungThreadEvent
besHungThreadEvent.description: Event related to detection of hung threads in Exchange BES.

besMailServerDownEvent.name: besMailServerDownEvent
besMailServerDownEvent.description: Event is generated when more than one user (or one user if there is only one) gets more than one error connecting to a particular mail server, and those errors are not Access Control related.

besMDStoBESConnectionEvent.name: besMDStoBESConnectionEvent
besMDStoBESConnectionEvent.description: MDS to BES connection state has changed.

besMDStoDBConnectionEvent.name: besMDStoDBConnectionEvent
besMDStoDBConnectionEvent.description: MDS to database connection state has changed.

besCriticalEvent.name: besCriticalEvent
besCriticalEvent.description: Critical event has happened. These are the events normally logged with 1xxxx and 5xxxx event IDs.
